enableAutomaticRespawn.desc:: Enables automatic respawning of structures, default:true

minutesUntilRespawn.desc:: Sets the time after which a structure can respawn, the timer starts after the last activity within the structure. default:2.880 minutes(48h)

increaseDifficultyWithRespawn.desc:: Enables increased difficulty with in respawned dungeons(mobs can get enchanted items/potions effects), default: true

dimensionBlackList.desc:: List of blacklisted dimension ids, e.g. minecraft:overworld   Seperate multiple entries by ,

respawnableStructureIDs.desc:: List of structure IDs that should respawn (others may still be detected and respawn, but this is the surefire way): e.g. minecraft:mansion

blacklistedStructures.desc:: List of blacklisted structures, those won't respawn ever: e.g. minecraft:mansion   Seperate multiple entries by ,

dungeonChestLoottables.desc:: List of loot tables of chests considered to be dungeon loot, partially used for detecting dungeons. Adding additional modded ones improves detection
